lines.text: You got to get out of here. Mrs. Dubrow hates kids. She once kicked Big Bird in the nuts.
From the look of my soup I'd say someone in your kitchen has a serious hair loss problem.
Kyle, I know you're upset about the vacation, but that is no excuse to throw a guest's dog into the garbage.
I didn't throw him in the garbage.
Then, what happened? No, no, don't tell me, let me guess. You decided to give him a coffee-ground bath to improve his coat.
He jumped off the dog walk.
The dog is suicidal? Is that what you're trying to tell me?
He smelled the monster on the ledge and jumped over.
Oh, it makes perfect sense now. He smelled the monster on the ledge. It is the smelly ledge monster.
Dad! There's a gorilla in the bathroom!
Kyle, there is no gorilla in the bathroom.
But, Dad...
Go back to sleep.
Where do you keep your champagne? Near the furnace?
Dad's gonna kill you when he finds that you lost his camcorder.
I didn't lose it. The gorilla did.
All right, the gorilla.
When we get back, you'll see.

[sees Dunston out the window; shouts]
HOLY SHIT!

[to Mrs. Winthrop]
He must really hate the Four Seasons.
No, no!
I will give you one week paid vacation if you go running out of this office crying.

[Consuelo starts up tears]
Hoo hoo hoo hoo. Ahhhhh.
[Lionel shouts hysterically after seeing Dunston and La Farge slaps him]
Why is everyone in this hotel always slapping me?'!
[La Farge slaps him again]

[to Kyle]
If anything happens to me, there's a box of magazines under my bed; get rid of them, okay?
Why is he talking to his crotch?
I like psychotic people. They get things done.
Monkey head. Monkey head.
When I was in the sewer once, I saw a turtle that was so big it looked like a Volkswagen with a tail.
Where did it come from?
Well, when two orangutans fall in love...
I think she means how did it get into the hotel.
Well, if your going to be grounded in a 5-star hotel it is the place to be.
Hello Mr. Dubrow. Wheres Mrs. Dubrow?
Scouting hotels in Alaska.
Dunston, I'm sorry. I was only trying to do my job. I didn't mean any harm. Do you forgive me?
[Dunston slaps La Farge]
I deserved that.

[to Kyle]
You know what my speciality is?
[Kyle shakes head]
I can make noisy little boys disappear.
Fluffy towels.
Excuse me.
Our guests want fluffy towels. Talk to laundry.
His name is Neil after Neil Armstrong
[in baby talk voice]
the first man on the moon, yes he was!
You do realize we'll probably end up living in a Motel 6?
Yep! Sounds pretty good to me.
Can I help you with somethin', son?
I'm lookin' for a Pongo Pygmaeus.

[slyly]
I catch you lookin' at my wife's "Pongo Pygmaeus" once more, I'm gonna break you in half.
Right.

]
NOOOO!
[Dunston drops a coconut on Lionel's head]
[first lines]
Welcome to the Majestic Hotel.
